summary: This mod adds a customized staff to Katlas Farm. This staff casts a spell that projects chickens that explode in a fireball on impact.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=orange][b]This is not a serious mod, it is meant for comedic value only! We all take this game way too seriously so have a bit of crazy fun!   .....but...you can take it serious if you want:)[/b][/color][/size]

[color=yellow][b]What This Mod Does[/b][/color]

This mod adds a customized staff to Katlas Farm. This staff casts a spell that projects chickens that explode in a fireball on impact.
(see screenshots for exact location)

Sound effects for ready,charge,and cast are set to chicken sounds. Enjoy :)

[color=yellow][b]OFFICIAL VIDEO[/b][/color]

[color=yellow][b]FUNNY FAN VID[/b][/color]
[youtube]ko2x-klIioc[/youtube]


[color=yellow][b]BUGS[/b][/color]

Chickens do not not survive impact


[color=yellow][b]INSTALL[/b][/color]

Option 1: Use Nexus Mod Manager to install Staff of Chicken Ball for you automatically

Option 2: Manually install by unzipping the compressed file, then placing the contents of the Staff of Chicken Ball folder
          into Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim directory
          Then check off chickenstaff.esp in the Data section when you first start your game.


[color=yellow][b]UN-INSTALL[/b][/color]

Option 1: Use Nexus Mod Manager to un-install automatically

Option 2: Manually remove the ChickenStaff folder from the meshes directory located in the
          Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data directory. Also remove the chickenstaff.esp from the data directory.
         

[color=yellow][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]

My Girlfriend - For putting up with my many hours of modding(She hates it when I credit her, but I am anyway)

Nifskope - For an awesome free 3D model editor

And special thanks to Nexus Sites for the wonderful modding community they provide!


Thank You!




clintmich
2012


version 1.Crazy
author: clintmich
